title: How Biden's wartime visit to Kyiv came together
description: President Joe Biden’s decision to make a risky wartime visit to Kyiv took root after a similarly clandestine mission just two months ago — when

title: Photos: President Biden makes historic visit to war-torn Ukraine
description: Pictures of President Joe Biden making a historic visit to Ukraine, riding the train into the country and meeting with Zelenskyy.

title: New 6.3-magnitude earthquake hits southern Turkey, setting off fresh fears
description: A 6.3-magnitude earthquake hit southern Turkey on Monday, the U.S. Geological Survey said, two weeks after the region was devastated by an earthquake that killed tens of thousands of people.

title: 6.4 magnitude earthquake hits devastated areas of Turkey and Syria
description: Just two weeks after a series of deadly earthquakes struck parts of Turkey and Syria, another 6.4 magnitude quake has hit the same region. It is unclear if there are any further casualties after the most recent earthquake.

title: Biden's foray into Ukraine deepens his investment in defeating Russia
description: When the president of the United States arrived in the Ukrainian capital on Monday morning, he removed any doubt: This is just as much Joe Biden's war.

title: Critics blast 'absurd' rewrites to Roald Dahl's children's books
description: Several children’s books by British author Roald Dahl are being rewritten without the iconic colorful language, drawing the ire of critics who have accused the publisher of censorship.

title: North Korea launches two short range ballistic missiles
description: North Korea appears to have launched two short range ballistic missiles into the waters off the Korean Peninsula, according to Japanese officials, marking its second missile launch in three days. NBC News’ Janis Mackey Frayer reports.

title: Farsi-language TV channel in U.K. moving to U.S. after warning of Iranian threat
description: Iran International, a U.K.-based Farsi-language TV channel, is moving to the U.S. after British officials cited threats to channel staff from Iranian agents.

title: President Biden makes surprise trip to Ukraine
description: President Biden made a surprise visit to Kyiv on Monday to meet with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy just days ahead of the one-year anniversary of Russia’s invasion of the country. NBC News’ Josh Lederman and Erin McLaughlin have the details.

title: Surprise and joy in Kyiv after Biden the mystery guest shuts down Ukraine’s capital
description: Officials and residents in Ukraine hailed President Joe Biden's Kyiv visit as a historic moment that carried huge symbolism ahead of the anniversary of Russia's war.

title: Australian professor taken hostage in highlands of Papua New Guinea
description: An Australian university professor is among a group taken hostage in the highlands of Papua New Guinea, the country’s prime minister said on Monday.

title: Biden visits Ukraine: ‘We’re with you as long as it takes’
description: Just days before the one-year anniversary of the war in Ukraine, President Biden traveled to Kyiv in an unprecedented trip to an active warzone, visiting a memorial for fallen Ukrainians alongside President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. NBC’s Erin McLaughlin reports for TODAY.

title: China hits back at U.S. allegations it is providing Russia nonlethal military aid in its war in Ukraine
description: China hit back on Monday against U.S. accusations that it may be providing Russia nonlethal military assistance in its war on Ukraine.

title: Watch: Air raid sirens sound as Biden, Zelenskyy walk to inspect honor guard
description: Air raid sirens sounded as President Joe Biden and his host Volodymyr Zelenskyy walked through Kyiv to inspect an honor gaurd and memorial.

title: Biden makes surprise visit to Ukraine nearly one year after Russia's invasion
description: President Joe Biden made a surprise and historic visit to war-torn Ukraine on Monday nearly a year into Russia's war.

title: Air raid sirens went off during Biden's Ukraine visit with Zelenskyy
description: Presidents Biden and Zelenskyy visited a memorial to thousands of fallen Ukrainians while air raid sirens sounded off. NBC News' Erin McLaughlin reports from Ukraine.

title: Biden makes surprise visit to Ukraine to mark one year after Russia's invasion
description: Nearly one year after the Russian invasion of Ukraine, President Joe Biden made a surprise visit to Ukraine. NBC News' Richard Engel reports on the historic visit.

title: North Korea fires more ballistic missiles, warns of turning Pacific into ‘firing range’
description: North Korea fired two more ballistic missiles on Monday, on the heels of similar firings that had prompted joint U.S.-South Korea , U.S- Japan air exercises.
